item.title: A. add a quote by Lisa St. Aubin de Teran
item.description: "Traveling is like flirting with life. It's like saying, 'I would stay and love you, but I have to go; this is my station." -- Lisa St. Aubin de Teran

item.title: A. add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: A. add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world." -- Voltaire

item.title: A. add a quote by Mike Doughty
item.description: "It's tragic that extremists co-opt the notion of God, and that hipsters and artists reject spirituality out of hand. I don't have a fixed idea of God. But I feel that it's us - the messed-up, the half-crazy, the burning, the questing - that need God, a lot more than the goody-two-shoes do." -- Mike Doughty

item.title: A. add a quote by Rachel Cohn
item.description: "It's a total lie to say there's only one person you're going to be with for the rest of your life. If you're lucky - and if you try really hard - there will always be more than one. " -- Rachel Cohn

item.title: A. add a quote by John Derbyshire
item.description: "I tell you, with complex numbers you can do anything." -- John Derbyshire

item.title: A. add a quote by Marisa de los Santos
item.description: "Jimmy Stewart is always and indisputably the best man in the world, unless Cary Grant should happen to show up." -- Marisa de los Santos

item.title: A. add a quote by Joshilyn Jackson
item.description: "There are gods in Alabama: Jack Daniel's, high school quarterbacks, trucks, big tits, and also Jesus." -- Joshilyn Jackson

item.title: A. add a quote by Lish McBride
A. add a quote by Magnus Flyte
item.description: "Only the passionate were immortal, it seemed. If you fought, screwed, screamed, laughed, or otherwise experienced life intensely, for better or worse, you left a record. Those who lived a quiet, well-behaved, well-tempered life? Gone without a trace." -- Magnus Flyte

item.title: A. add a quote by Mike Carey
item.description: "That's what I've never been able to get about religion: that charmless combination of altruism and insanity. Give me a cynical, self-interested bastard any day of the week; at least you can play chicken with him and know he'll stick to the rules." -- Mike Carey

item.title: A. add a quote by Margaret Maron
item.description: "A woman’s body doesn’t quit just because her heart breaks." -- Margaret Maron

item.title: A. add a quote by Rilke
item.description: "you are not too old and it is not too late to dive into your increasing depths where life calmly gives out it's own secret" -- Rilke
